HELP.TITLE: App Help
HELP.CREATE_LIST_DESC: Create a new list with a title, add participants and specify what should be brought.
HELP.SHARE_LIST_DESC: Share your list with friends via the share button and copy the link or download the QR code.
HELP.EDIT_LIST_DESC: As the creator, you can edit or delete the list at any time.
HELP.SECURITY_TIP: Please note: Only share the link using the share button, otherwise others can change your data!
HELP.PREVIEW_TIP: Use the preview function to see how your list appears to others.

SHARE.TITLE: Share with others!
SHARE.DOWNLOAD_QRCODE: You can download this QR code and share it with others. When they scan it, they will be directed to your list immediately
SHARE.SHARE_LINK_HINT:
Note: Shared links only allow viewing and editing the guest list, 
not changing the title, moderator, or due date.

HOME.YOU_HAVE_TIME_UNTIL: You have until {{dueDate}} to edit and adjust your entries.
HOME.SHARE_TOOLTIP: Please save the form first, then click on share
HOME.CONTRIBUTION_MAX_LENGTH_ERROR: The contribution is too long. Maximum 500 characters allowed.
